A moderate intensity allows me to conserve energy while still being effective in hunting, increasing my chances of survival.

By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves while still being able to hunt effectively when the opportunity arises. This strategy helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.
